Body:
"""Test to see if the nimporter.cd function actually works."""
cwd = Path('.').absolute()
temp_dir = Path('nim-temp').absolute()
try:
    temp_dir.mkdir()
    with nimporter.cd(temp_dir) as tmp:
        assert tmp == temp_dir
        assert Path().resolve() == temp_dir
        assert Path().resolve() == tmp
    assert Path().resolve() == cwd
finally:
    temp_dir.rmdir()
